Reviews.Title: Not unlocked
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: The seller told me this was an unlocked phone.  For my surprise it did not worked, it will always say "Emergency calls only".I had to spend 30$ more to really unlock it and make it work.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: wen
Reviews.Content: excelente el producto!!!! Muy responsable y super puntual con el envio del producto comprado!!! Me encanto mucho y tenia el producto disponible

Reviews.Content: The telephone I do not get to my hands since I committed an error in the address and I could not change it.Himself delivery I give up someone else.Thanks himself that your service is very good.
